h1. Rails Locale Data Comparsion Chart

Simple Rails engine for generating a comparsion chart. There's an app template 
to help you get started:

rails rails-i18n-examples -m http://github.com/svenfuchs/rails-i18n/raw/master/tools/rails-i18n-examples/config/app_template.rb

http://localhost:3000/rails-i18n/examples should point to the comparsion chart.
